CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	MISJUDGMENT                     	MISJG                     
B            	MISTAKE                          	MISTK                     
C            	CALCULATED RISK                  	CALCR                      
D            	LACK OF SUPERVISION              	LASUP                      
E            	INATTENTION                      	INATT                      
F            	CARELESS                         	CARLS                     
G            	RECKLESS                         	RCKLS                      
H            	UNSKILLED IN AIRCRAFT            	UNSKL                      
I            	UNSKILLED IN TYPE OF OPERATION   	UNOPS                      
J            	UNFORSEEN SITUATION              	UNSIT                      
K            	STOLEN AIRCRAFT                  	STOLN                      
L            	PILOT INCAPACITATION-MEDICAL     	INMED                     
M            	PILOT INCAPACITATION-ALCOHOL     	INACL                      
N            	PILOT INCAPACITATION-OTHER       	INOTH                      
O            	BIRD STRIKE                      	BIRDS                      
P            	DENSITY ALTITUDE                 	DENAL                      
Q            	LACK OF RECENT EXPERIENCE        	LREXP                     
R            	WEATHER-PILOT RCVD WX BRIEFING   	WXBRF                      
S            	OTHER                            	OTHER                      
T            	SUPPLEMENT FORTHCOMING           	SUPFC                      
U            	UNKNOWN                          	UNK                        
V           	WEATHER-BRIEFING NOT REPORTED    	WXBRU                     
W            	WEATHER-PILOT NOT WX BRIEFED     	WXNBR                      
Y            	PILOT REPORTED DEPRESSED         	PLRPTDEP                   
99999        	OPER CAUSE CAT INVALID           	ERROR MESSAGE
